items.headline: An intro to the first two steps of the 'design thinking' process: developing empathy & framing the problem/opportunity.

Improve your ability to think more like a designer (open to opportunities) rather than as a manager focused on constraints.
Strengthen your empathy,  meaning your ability to better understand people and their needs.

items.title: The Ultimate Guide for Land Surveying with Drones - Part 2
items.headline: Learn to work with Pix4D & DroneDeploy outputs on QGIS, AutoCAD & Google Earth. Start your own UAV mapping business now!
